description.value:
A spellstriker staff is wrought iron with gleaming arcane sigils etched into its surface and a sharp point at the bottom. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +1 striking shifting staff.

ActivateF envision

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You use Spellstrike with a non-cantrip spell and miss with the Strike

Effect An explosion of magical energy—stored up for the Spellstrike—explodes out. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] take 1d6 damage per level of the spell, with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. This damage is the same type the spell would have dealt, and the activation gains that trait; if the spell would have dealt multiple types of damage, choose one of them. If the damage of the explosion is mental, the save is Will instead of Reflex.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Produce Flame]{Produce Flame}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Echoing Weapon]{Echoing Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Arrow]{Acid Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Maneuver]{Telekinetic Maneuver}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Echoing Weapon]{Echoing Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Haste]{Haste}
  • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Arrow]{Acid Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Weapon Storm]{Weapon Storm}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Blink Charge]{Blink Charge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Echoing Weapon]{Echoing Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Vampiric Touch]{Vampiric Touch}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Arrow]{Acid Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Weapon Storm]{Weapon Storm}
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Blink Charge]{Blink Charge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.True Target]{True Target}

Craft Requirements You have the magus's Spellstrike activity. Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
